meanings.definition: A unit of area equal to 100 square meters.
meanings.sent1: The field measured five centares in total.
meanings.sent2: The garden was divided into centares for planting different crops.
meanings.sent3: The centares on the map seemed to dance as the wind blew the paper around.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was so vast, it covered centares of land.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow sunflowers filled the centares with color and life.
